Description.Text:
Position L 'Hotel Conte Luna, located in Via Benazza 6, thanks to its easily accessible location is ideal for either business or leisure travelers, who want or need to be close to the center of Bologna. It is just 5 km from Piazza Maggiore, 4 km from the railway station, a few kilometers from the airport G. Marconi Airport. The cordiality of the staff at Hotel Conte Luna will accompany you throughout your stay with discretion, efficiency and attention to detail, in order to make your stay unforgettable.
Restaurant A sweet awakening gladdened by the heady scent of warm croissants, freshly prepared every morning, accompanied by the aroma of a good coffee and more, all served in a relaxed and colorful setting like that of Hotel Conte Luna.
